normalized: two weeks had passed since kousuke and asagi's relationship became that of a man and woman.
the two had been having sex day and night, making sure to avoid being seen.
the bedroom art, the thorns of flame.
the pleasures of the flesh swelled whenever they embraced each other.
they were starting to eat away at the pair's minds and bodies like a slow poison.
kousuke hadn't noticed that at all.
that day.
the figure of a man was in the gosha academy principal's office.
the man's name was yamamoto nobushige.
he was the director of the ministry of home affairs's public security agency, third investigation division ＜section three＞.
he was the top bureaucrat for business that connected the government and the taimanin.
he was asagi's immediate superior.
he was a man who had now reached the point of being elderly, but the glint in his eye was sharp.

he was a sharp man who always supported the taimanin by making use of his resourcefulness and political power, for the sake of fighting the evil that man and demon conspired towards, and exacting justice.
the relationship between himself and the taimanin was close.
once, the taimanin were an illegal organization under direct government control.

however, starting with the chaos arena incident, with their extreme superhuman power being feared by the bureaucrats of the government of the time, the taimanin had been inserted into a subordinate office of the public security agency.
the one who had been elected as its leader was yamamoto, who belonged to the ministry of defence at the time.
the bureaucrats' intention was to gain control of the powers of the taimanin, who had a propensity to act recklessly.
however, yamamoto was not a man who would readily abide by that.
to start with, he made it an officially recognized government agency, began to openly use the budget to the maximum, and modernized the taimanin's equipment.
meanwhile, he incorporated non-shinobi aviation/vehicle personnel and maintenance personnel.
additionally, he planned to review the curriculum of gosha academy, which had been established in no time for the sake of training the future generation of taimanin.
yamamoto was also the one who appointed asagi, who had been regarded as extremely dangerous by the government, as principal of the academy.
over 10 years after that.
now, the taimanin had transformed into a group possessed of mobility, offensive capability and intelligence investigation ability incomparable to before.
the taimanin had literally been organized by yamamoto.
yamamoto rarely appeared in gosha academy.
asagi, sakura and murasaki were lined up in front of their superior, making fairly serious faces.
yamamoto spoke, surveying the three.

name: yamamoto
normalized: the reason i got you to assemble here is that there is some intelligence bothering me.
when he said that much, his eyebrow raised with a twitch.

name: yamamoto
normalized: what, so few?

name: asagi
normalized: what?
asagi asked back, representing the three.

name: yamamoto
normalized: what happened to the other top guys?
murasaki, where's kurou?

name: murasaki
normalized: ani-ue is still abroad on a mission… i apologize.
murasaki said like she felt obliged to.

name: sakura
normalized: yukki and rinko-chan are in the middle of an infiltration mission…?

name: asagi
normalized: director.
we three are all we could assemble right now.
the others are all commanding their posts.

name: yamamoto
normalized: that's right, isn't it?
the strongest taimanin has exposed a weak point in regard to continuously occurring incidents “linked to hell”…
slight concern showed through on yamamoto's face.

name: asagi
normalized: right…
asagi made the appropriate response.

name: asagi
normalized: so, director, what do you want to say?
asagi prompted yamamoto.

name: yamamoto
normalized: oh, right.
this is a confidential account i heard from a friend of mine…
yamamoto prefaced, and said,

name: yamamoto
normalized: do you know about powered exoskeletons?

name: asagi
normalized: …yeah, from rumours.
asagi nodded.

name: asagi
normalized: if i remember rightly, they were said to play the leading role in the development of 21st-century land weapons around the world.

name: sakura
normalized: what?
what?
a secret weapon or something?!
sakura leaned forward, like the term “powered exoskeleton” had stimulated something.

name: murasaki
normalized: don't make a happy-looking face.
asagi-sama said land weapons.
as it were, a powered suit.
murasaki chided sakura and started to explain.

name: murasaki
normalized: it's a state-of-the-art weapon developed based on the concept of a next-generation foot soldier endowed with armour and firepower that could counter tanks and attack helicopters; resistance to extreme terrain; and the mobility to be able operate over a long distance for a long period of time.

name: sakura
normalized: uhh… anyway, that's it!
that's a robot!
gives the impression that selected children or something board them to fight angels.

name: murasaki
normalized: what are you talking about?
well, that's wrong at any rate, but you can think of it like that.

name: sakura
normalized: i see～.
uh-huh.

name: yamamoto
normalized: development of those powered exoskeletons is proceding in our country too.

name: asagi
normalized: if i'm not mistaken, it's the pex-88-type being developed by the ground self-defence forces.

name: yamamoto
normalized: that's right.
development is almost complete, and it's been christened the 『pex-88-type version raiden』.

name: yamamoto
normalized: and, raiden that were awaiting test operation went missing from a fuji base a few days ago.

name: sakura
normalized: hohohh, that means the confederation's new model was stolen!

name: murasaki
normalized: what confederation…?
ignoring sakura's fantasies, asagi continued.

name: asagi
normalized: hmm, so the anticipated new weapons are missing?
the tone with which she said so seemed somewhat cynical.

name: yamamoto
normalized: the reason i did not say “seized” is because they literally vanished.

name: asagi
normalized: that's a very suspicious story.

name: yamamoto
normalized: thus, i came here.
yamamoto said with an insinuative tone of voice.

name: asagi
normalized: ――so, i wonder what connection there is between that vanished new weapon and us?
asagi got to the core of the issue at hand.
sakura and murasaki also paid close attention to yamamoto.

name: yamamoto
normalized: a raiden is a powered exoskeleton that has been put to use next to the american federation's powered exoskeleton, 『alexander』.

name: yamamoto
normalized: having licensed the technology from 『alexander』 for many parts, it would be no exaggeration to call it a japanese-made alexander.

name: yamamoto
normalized: and lots of hellish technologies that our country has prevented from leaking to foreign countries are used in alexander.

name: yamamoto
normalized: to put it more concretely, it has been pointed out that there are technologies and many areas of similarity that were stolen from ryuumon at the time of the tokyo kingdom incident.

name: asagi
normalized: so it's like that…
asagi muttered.
her quiet voice was filled with a deep anger.

name: sakura
normalized: …will they come here?
sakura also made an unusually gloomy face.

name: murasaki
normalized: asagi-sama, sakura…
murasaki looked at the pair anxiously.
the tokyo kingdom incident.
that was a life-or-death struggle with ryuumon, an organization of the chinese union, which controlled that place.
at least, it was so officially.
the origin of the incident was that three taimanin had broken off contact in tokyo kingdom.
pursuing them, asagi and sakura infiltrated tokyo kingdom.
there, the two encountered a mysterious girl, saya.
saya was an artificial weapon that ryuumon had manufactured, having obtained the technology of hell.
a majin (human-demon) that crossbred a taimanin with a demon from hell, asagi and sakura ended up suffering defeat from her mighty power, which repelled even anti-demon power.
awaiting the captured asagi and sakura had been a clone of oboro, who had been produced by the medical technology of hell.
clone oboro, who had become the leader of ryuumon, inflicted severe training on asagi and sakura in order to avenge her original self, who had been killed.
her objective was to turn the two into the cores of new majin by making them completely submit to the training, and drive them to suicide on top of that.
asagi and sakura had desperately continued to endure that repulsive training.
as despair crept up on them, they had escaped from their predicament by capitalizing on a mere tiny chance, and engaged in a final battle with saya.
asagi had won.
by awakening the “demonic power” sleeping within her.
saya, the pitiful girl whose life had been toyed with by ryuumon, fell in battle.
now asagi knew the truth.
in the shadow of that incident was the secret maneuvering of nomad president edwin black.
no, the very disappearance of the taimanin was black's trap to lure asagi to tokyo kingdom.
behind the scenes of asagi's life-or-death struggle, black had been taking possession of ryuumon's technology, as if to sneer at her.
furthermore, oboro's clone, who had driven asagi to the brink of death, had simply been killed by the original oboro, who had been resurrected as a vampire of black's.
everything had happened on the palm of that king of the undead, edwin black.

name: asagi
normalized: nomad is in the shadow of the american federation, huh?
asagi said, like she was reflecting on the bitter defeat of six years ago.
sakura was also motionlessly silent.

name: murasaki
normalized: does the director think that nomad took the raiden?
murasaki asked yamamoto, amid the heavy atmosphere.

name: yamamoto
normalized: even if we can say it is nomad, i don't think they could do something like steal a new weapon from a self-defence force base.

name: yamamoto
normalized: it's reasonable to consider that someone connected to it is acting behind the scenes.

name: murasaki
normalized: that there are those in the self-defence forces and the government who support nomad?

name: yamamoto
normalized: maybe.
or, it's conceivable that it's the crime of an entirely unknown power.

name: yamamoto
normalized: either way, everything is under the category of conjecture, but you can't be too careful.
this is information related to raiden.
look it over.
there's no time to feel down.
yamamoto picked up a file, which he had placed on the desk, and presented it to asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: who's feeling down?
thanks, i got it.
a daring smile was suspended on the face of asagi, who took the file.

name: asagi
normalized: raiden's specifications?
where did you obtain such a thing, when weapon specs are meant to be special a-rank classified information?

name: yamamoto
normalized: it's information procured from an organization in the american federation.

name: asagi
normalized: what do you mean?

name: yamamoto
normalized: there are anti-nomad factions even in the american federation.
yamamoto said without moving an eyebrow.

name: asagi
normalized: as i'd expect of you.
asagi said, clearly admiring yamamoto's usual ability, and whatever method he had used.
purururururu♪
yamamoto's mobile phone rang.

name: yamamoto
normalized: excuse me.
yamamoto excused himself with a couple words, and took the phone out from his pocket.

name: yamamoto
normalized: really, now.
without immediately answering the phone, he frowned.
from that, asagi guessed who the caller was.

name: asagi
normalized: the chief cabinet secretary again?
it was nonomura, who had previously come to gosha academy, purportedly to inspect it, but really to find fault.

name: yamamoto
normalized: indeed.
really, it's like that man wants to put collars on our necks.

name: sakura
normalized: ugeeh, that guy again?

name: murasaki
normalized: he's an obstinate man.
sakura and murasaki said their complaints together.

name: asagi
normalized: i wonder if his former pacifist self-defence force-bashing has now become taimanin-bashing?
chief cabinet secretary is a position with a surprising amount of free time.

name: yamamoto
normalized: even you will go on to tokyo before long, asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: thanks for that.
not getting the phone?
the ringtone was still sounding.
yamamoto was fittingly ignoring it, but nonomura was fairly persistent.
when she saw his face, it became clear that such a thing took place on a routine basis.

name: yamamoto
normalized: i'll take this outside.
it'll be a problem if there's shouting from sakura in the background.
yamamoto said something that seemed unusually like a joke, and left the principal's office.

name: sakura
normalized: does he have so little faith in me…?
sakura said, with a face that said she didn't understand.

name: asagi
normalized: he doesn't want to make us listen to someone like that hateful chief cabinet secretary, does he?
the director's being considerate.

name: sakura
normalized: is that soo?
sakura tilted her head in doubt.

name: murasaki
normalized: asagi-sama, is it all right?
murasaki addressed asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: what?
you want to see this thing about raiden?
asagi was about to hand over the specification documents she just received, but murasaki shook her head.

name: murasaki
normalized: no, it's about kiryuu…

name: asagi
normalized: ah.
asagi nodded.

name: asagi
normalized: your face tells me it's not going well.

name: murasaki
normalized: i'm sorry.
i've searched using every possible method, but there's no sign of him…

name: asagi
normalized: two weeks today?
i didn't trust that man from the beginning, but to go missing all of a sudden is unusual.
murasaki nodded, like she didn't want to say too much.

name: murasaki
normalized: so… asagi-sama, it doesn't seem like kiryuu betrayed me and ran away from this village, but…

name: asagi
normalized: yeah.
i think so too.

name: sakura
normalized: uh-huh.
i think kiryuu-chin's nature is rotten, and his character's definitely despicable, but his loyalty to mucchan at least is genuine.
sakura suddenly interrupted.

name: murasaki
normalized: if kiryuu is alive, i'll get angry, sakura…

name: sakura
normalized: ohh!
mucchan's backing up kiryuu-chin.
well, surely this doesn't mean mucchan also lo――

name: murasaki
normalized: if you say more than that, i'll kill you, sakura.

name: sakura
normalized: i won't say it, won't say it!
mucchan's scaary!
forgive me～～
sakura joked.

name: murasaki
normalized: honestly.
murasaki made a face like she had swallowed a bitter bug.

name: asagi
normalized: still, it is annoying.
when it comes to having to search the village these past 2 weeks… i can't be too concerned about kiryuu.

name: sakura
normalized: i know, right?
it looks like something serious is about to begin.

name: murasaki
normalized: asagi-sama, please wait a little to report this to the director.

name: asagi
normalized: do you happen to know something more?

name: murasaki
normalized: i don't know anything, but the only place we haven't searched is here.
the school.

name: asagi
normalized: here?
asagi opened her eyes wide like she was surprised.
sakura also had a blank look.

name: sakura
normalized: the school?
mucchan, even that's not it, is it?
there's nowhere in the academy he can hide.

name: murasaki
normalized: th, that's right, but…
murasaki tried to tell herself, but she prevaricated, probably not believing that he was in the school.

name: sakura
normalized: kiryuu-chin sulked and ran away because mucchan hits him everyday, didn't he?

name: murasaki
normalized: he was happy being hit.

name: sakura
normalized: yeah, but, it was somehow not good enough for kiryuu-chin's type, right?
i dunno…

name: murasaki
normalized: did i raise him the wrong way…?
murasaki pondered, folding her arms.
as kiryuu's supervisor, it was like she felt responsible for him having suddenly left.

name: asagi
normalized: it's okay, murasaki.
try to search for just one more week.

name: murasaki
normalized: th, thank you very much!
then, i'll be off.
when asagi permitted it, murasaki's face brightened in a flash, and she rushed out hurriedly.

name: sakura
normalized: ushishi～♪
mucchan, it's love, love!
as one would expect when you're being wooed so much every day, looks like mucchan is worried about kiryuu-chin～
sakura smirked.

name: asagi
normalized: i wonder if that's so?
it looks to me like an owner worried about their favourite pet running away, though.

name: sakura
normalized: how sweet, onee-chan.
that's unmistakably love!
do your best, mucchan!
i won't help you, 'cause kiryuu-chin's disgusting, but i'm watching over you warmly from a distance♪

name: asagi
normalized: sakura, you're not murasaki, but suppose you do something about your own love soon?
just don't worry about people.
you're at a good age, after all.

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chan?
sakura looked at asagi like she was startled.

name: sakura
normalized: what's this now?!
what's with those relaxed, condescending words just now?
as if to say you have a boyfriend now!
i mean, something about love, from onee-chan's mouth!
love!

name: asagi
normalized: wh, what are you saying?!

name: sakura
normalized: aah, your face is red!
onee-chan did get a boyfriend, didn't you?
who is it?
hey, who, who?

name: asagi
normalized: it's not like that!
no, it's just a person i have regular conversations with now and again.
that's enough, so go back to the staff room.
asagi opened the door of the principal's office and pushed out the shouting sakura.

name: sakura
normalized: eh?
hey, wait!
onee-chan, this conversation isn't over!
onee-chan.
onee-chan!
she forcibly shut the door.
on the other side of the hallway, sakura left while grumbling.

name: asagi
normalized: phew, risky, risky.
asagi felt relieved.
her face was simply that of a woman who was falling into a secret love with a younger man.
meanwhile, kousuke was reporting to muroi in a good mood.
he wasn't thinking about anything.
no, he might have become unable to think.

name: kousuke
normalized: muroi-sensei, this power is truly amazing.

name: kousuke
normalized: even though she dislikes it a little, when i use the thorns of flame, she starts to lose her composure immediately, and practically does as i tell her during sex.

name: muroi
normalized: i see.
you've become pretty familiar with how to use your power, eh?

name: kousuke
normalized: yeah, really!
kousuke nodded vigorously.
in only 2 weeks, kousuke no longer had any kind of problem with violating asagi with the bedroom art.
no longer felt guilty about controlling the mind and body of a woman with the unusual powers called the bedroom arts.

name: muroi
normalized: looks like there's no problem regarding the state of your health either.

name: kousuke
normalized: of course.
my energy is so abundant, i'm almost worried.
no, i'm not worried at all, ha ha!
perhaps because violating the woman he had always longed for had given him so much confidence, kousuke expressed a smile that one could even call hubris.

name: muroi
normalized: that's promising.
that's right, i prepared the thing you were asking me for.
muroi handed a polypropylene bag to kousuke.

name: kousuke
normalized: this is…?
kousuke checked inside.
a thing similar to litmus paper had been inserted.

name: muroi
normalized: right, it's a pregnancy test.
you'll know if you drip a few drops of saliva from the woman you want to examine.

name: muroi
normalized: if this part of the white paper turns red, it means the woman is pregnant.

name: kousuke
normalized: got it.

name: muroi
normalized: it can also be determined by urine.
that's more your forte now, isn't it?

name: kousuke
normalized: eh?
you could say that!
kousuke said, teeming with confidence, and carefully stored the bag with the pregnancy test in his pocket.

name: muroi
normalized: so, who's this woman whose pregnancy is in question?
the woman you tested the bedroom art on?

name: kousuke
normalized: th, that's right…

name: muroi
normalized: what will you do if she is pregnant?

name: kousuke
normalized: if possible… i want to have her give birth.

name: muroi
normalized: how manly.
also, it's a splendid idea.
if there's something i can do, you can come and consult about anything, kousuke-kun.

name: kousuke
normalized: thank you very much!
i'm really grateful to muroi-sensei for everything!
kousuke smiled with his whole face, and bowed his head.

name: muroi
normalized: don't worry about it.
since you're really helping me too with this drug trial.
muroi replied, looking pleased.
naturally, kousuke never noticed that that was an act.

name: kousuke
normalized: well, i have an appointment now.

name: muroi
normalized: sorry for taking up your time.
so, the next examination is next monday.

name: kousuke
normalized: okay!
excuse me.
with energy as if to say he wanted to have his next sex at once, kousuke left the infirmary.

name: muroi
normalized: hmph.
muroi grinned.
it was a wicked smile that had never been seen by kousuke.

name: muroi
normalized: well, i think the next examination will be unnecessary, but…
then, the floor “jumped”.

name: muroi
normalized: it's a surprise you're still alive.
i thought your whole body would be dissolving about now.
muroi―demonic specialist doctor furst pounded the floor with scorn.
perhaps having sniffed out a faint rotting smell, a small insect was flying in the infirmary, which had transformed into the dwelling of evil.
